page.title: 10Media
page.content: Ten people were asked about their favourite{T.V. channel}and{Newspaper} in the Repton and Newton Solney area. Most people gave a definite answer but a few did not have any one favourite. The 'Daily Telegraph' was easily the most popular newspaper with the 'Express' coming second - the 'Times' only had one vote, this was a rather surprising result. The favourite T.V. channel was I.T.V and people seemed to think it gave more entertainment and was generally the best. Channel 4 was the second most popular and most people thought that it had got off the ground very well.
